title: Exploring the factors, affordances and constraints outlining the implementation of Artificial Intelligence in public sector organizations
theoretical_background: Technology Affordances and Constraints Theory (TACT); TOE framework
technology_discussed: Artificial intelligence; Machine learning; Autonomous vehicles
research_description: This study explores how AI is implemented in public sector organizations in Europe, highlighting factors that influence AI deployment and the affordances and constraints these technologies bring.
research_results: AI implementation in the public sector is influenced by technological, organizational, and environmental factors, with a need for continuous training and adaptation to the evolving nature of AI systems.
future_research: Future studies could focus on the long-term implications of AI implementation on public services and citizen trust, particularly in a multi-stakeholder environment.
